mapper.select: SELECT TMG_F_GET_MGD_C (TMG_F_GET_MGD_C ( TNTF_CTYPE, #{yyyymmdd}, 2, TNTF_CCUSTOMERID, TNTF_CCOMPANYID, 'ja' ), #{yyyymmdd},3) || TMG_F_CONV_MIN2HHMI(DECODE(TNTF_NTIMEZONE_CLOSE-TNTF_NTIMEZONE_OPEN,0,null,TNTF_NTIMEZONE_CLOSE-TNTF_NTIMEZONE_OPEN)) FROM TMG_NOTIFICATION WHERE #{yyyymmdd} BETWEEN TNTF_DBEGIN AND TNTF_DEND AND TNTF_CSTATUSFLG = 'TMG_NTFSTATUS|5' AND TNTF_CEMPLOYEEID = #{empId} AND TNTF_CCOMPANYID = #{compCode} AND TNTF_CCUSTOMERID = #{custID}
